kDesc
To become the ultimate ninja assassin, you must first learn the way of the warrior. This apprentice outfit is perfect for your training. [#Legal]
Afin de devenir l’assassin ninja absolu, il vous faut d’abord apprendre la voie du guerrier. Cette tenue d’apprenti vous ira comme un gant lors de votre formation. [#Legal]
Um der ultimative Ninja-Assassine zu werden, musst du erst den Pfad des Kriegers beschreiten. Dieses Lehrlingsoutfit ist perfekt für dein Training. [#Legal]
Per diventare l'assassino ninja estremo dovrai prima imparare l'atteggiamento del guerriero. Questo costume da apprendista è perfetto per il tuo allenamento. [#Legal]
Para llegar a ser el mejor ninja asesino, tendrás que aprender primero el camino del guerrero. Este atuendo de aprendiz es perfecto para tu entrenamiento. [#Legal]
究極の暗殺者になるには、忍術を極めなければならない。修行を行うには見習いの衣装は最適。[#Legal]
궁극의 닌자 암살자가 되려면, 먼저 전사의 방식을 익혀야 합니다. 이 견습생 복장은 훈련에 딱입니다. [#Legal]
To become the ultimate ninja assassin, you must first learn the way of the warrior. This apprentice outfit is perfect for your training. [#Legal]
要成為終極忍者刺客，您首先必須學會忍術。這套學徒套裝最適合訓練。[#Legal]
要成為終極忍者刺客，您首先必須學會忍術。這套學徒套裝最適合訓練。[#Legal]
To become the ultimate ninja assassin, you must first learn the way of the warrior. This apprentice outfit is perfect for your training. [#Legal]
